matrix.factory

Interface FactoryMatrix

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FactoryMatrixDefault, FactoryMatrixSparse, FactoryMatrixSparseHash, FactoryMatrixSparseHashPar, FactoryMatrixThreshold, FactoryMatrixTrove, FactoryMatrixTrovePar

    public interface FactoryMatrix
extends java.io.Serializable
    This interface defines the method for the matrix factories to create matrices with different implementations.
    Author:
    Antonela Tommasel

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Matrix createIdentity(int rowSize)
      Creates an Identity Matrix of rowSize x rowSize
      Matrix createMatrix(int rowSize, int colSize)
      Creates a matrix of rowSize x colSize
      Matrix createMatrix(Matrix toCopy)
      Creates a Matrix by copying the values of the other Matrix

    • Method Detail

      • createMatrix

        Matrix createMatrix(int rowSize,
                  int colSize)
        Creates a matrix of rowSize x colSize
        Parameters:
        rowSize - number of rows of the matrix to be created
        colSize - number of columns of the matrix to be created
        Returns:
        the created matrix

      • createMatrix

        Matrix createMatrix(Matrix toCopy)
        Creates a Matrix by copying the values of the other Matrix
        Parameters:
        toCopy - Matrix to copy the values in the new Matrix
        Returns:
        the created matrix

      • createIdentity

        Matrix createIdentity(int rowSize)
        Creates an Identity Matrix of rowSize x rowSize
        Parameters:
        rowSize - dimensionality of the Identity
        Returns:
        the Identity of dimensionality rowSize
